scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python && yarn run lint-js
scripts.lint-python: flake8 webapp tests && black --check --line-length 79 webapp tests
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle static/css/modules static/js/modules
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --source-map true --output-style compressed --output static/css && postcss --map false --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.build: mkdir -p static/dist && webpack &&  yarn run build-css
